items.question: What quality can I expect from restored photos?
items.answer: Expect excellent quality with enhancements improving both color accuracy and detail preservation. Our AI solution excels at repairing and revitalizing old images, providing a professional finish that captures the essence of your memories.

items.question: Can I restore severely damaged photos?
items.answer: Yes! Our AI technology is designed to handle a range of damages, from minor wear to significant deterioration. It intelligently predicts colors and restores details, ensuring the best possible results.

items.question: What formats can I use for photo restoration?
items.answer: We support various image formats including JPG, PNG, and TIFF. Ensure that your image is of adequate resolution for optimal restoration results.

items.question: Is the restoration process reversible?
items.answer: Once you download the restored image, it is a final output. We recommend keeping your original files safe to ensure you can always return to them if needed.

items.question: How long does restoration take?
items.answer: Most restorations are completed in just a few minutes, depending on the complexity of the image and the options selected.

items.question: What are the pricing options for photo restoration?
items.answer: Our pricing is flexible with a pay-as-you-go model. You only pay for the images you restore, and costs can vary based on the selected restoration features.

items.question: Can I restore multiple photos at once?
items.answer: Yes! You can batch upload and restore multiple images simultaneously for efficient processing.

items.question: Do I retain rights to the restored images?
items.answer: Absolutely! All restored images come with full commercial usage rights, allowing you to use them for personal or professional purposes without additional fees.

items.question: What support is available if I have issues?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive support, including detailed FAQs, video tutorials, and customer service to assist with any questions or technical issues.
